pyramid.plunder

Class Loot

  • java.lang.Object
    • pyramid.plunder.Drawable
      • pyramid.plunder.GameObject
        • pyramid.plunder.PhysicsObject
          • pyramid.plunder.Loot

  • public class Loot
extends PhysicsObject
    This Loot Class extends the PhysicsObject; the image, the weapon, the int location and the int maxValue are implemented; the playability of the loot is also made.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class pyramid.plunder.PhysicsObject

        gravity, velocity

      • Fields inherited from class pyramid.plunder.GameObject

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Loot(int[] location, int maxValue)
      This int location and int maxValue are passed down to Loot; the graphics, location, and size are implemented.
      Loot(int[] location, int[] image, Weapon weapon)
      The int location, int image, Weapon weapon are passed down to Loot; the location is make and the set size is also implemented.
